concept.title: Confirming BIG-IP TLS connections in a private VLAN
concept.shortdesc: You can confirm your large scale TLS connections in F5 BIG-IP.

section.title: Example large scale TLS connection
section.p: The following example shows a BIG-IP VM with 8 VCPU and 64GB of memory using a TLSv1.2 handshake with a 3600 TLS v1.2 handshake with a AES256-GCM-SHA384 2 kilobyte cipher key, running at a rate of 4K handshakes per second. The example shows that 2M of these connections can use about 25GB of memory in the TMM process on the BIG-IP VM.
